properties.name: positivePrompt
properties.default: a blonde attractive woman, portrait, amateurish quality with dramatic light and shadows, some blur and with vibe of 2000s street photography
properties.description: The main subject and style of the image you want to generate.

properties.name: imageHeight
properties.description: The height of the output image in pixels.

properties.name: imageWidth
properties.description: The width of the output image in pixels.

properties.name: batchSize
properties.description: The number of images to generate.

properties.name: outputAsFilePath
properties.description: Whether to save the output to a specified file path. Uncheck to output as binary data.

properties.name: outputFilePath
properties.description: The full file path to save the output image.

properties.name: outputBinaryPropertyName
properties.description: The name to give the output binary property.
